name: The hiker's puzzle
description:
In the hiker's puzzle you play a hiker who recently found a bunch of slime alongside his path. He decided to take them to the nearest lab but the problem is, the slimes keep changing form. In order to keep going you have to nicely arrange them in your bag everytime they change!

This game was made by Bastien Doret and Oscar Romestant. All the art goes to our lovelies artist Lény Roux and Hervaud Lucie. Go check their work on instagram  : @lenyrouxlibre and @lucie_graphiste
